info.author: Philip Pavlik ppavlik@memphis.edu
info.abstract: The F-Test 5x2 component computes an F-test for model result files formatted the same way as the outputs from AnalysisTKT componenent.
info.description: Using the methods described in these papers: E. Alpaydm, Combined 5 x 2 cv F Test for Comparing Supervised Classification Learning Algorithms, Neural Computation, vol. 11, pp. 1885-1892, 1999. T.G. Dietterich, Approximate Statistical Tests for Comparing Supervised Classification Learning Algorithms, Neural Computation, vol. 10, pp. 1895-1923, 1998.

inputs.b: XML model result files from TKT or other components

info.options: Select which of the test fit stats to use from the XML, either AUC, Accuracy, or RMSE.
